About the Company: Sanco Trans Ltd is engaged in the entire range of cargo handling activities namely clearing forwarding and transporting container handling and warehousing.The services offered by the company:Container Freight Station, Chennai,Container Freight Station, Thoothukudi,Air Cargo,Stevedoring,Warehousing & Distribution,Inland Container Depot-Salem (ICD),Transport & Equipment,Sanco Container Terminal,Customs Clearance,Multimodal Transport Operation/Freight Forwarding and Civil Engineering.
